com.adobe.cq.social.forum.client.api

Interface Forum<P extends Post,C extends ForumConfiguration>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    CommentCollection<P,C>, SocialCollectionComponent, SocialComponent
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Calendar, Journal
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractForum

    public interface Forum<P extends Post,C extends ForumConfiguration>
extends CommentCollection<P,C>
    Specification of a forum. A Forum is a collection of topics.
